rules.name: Impaired Mobility
rules.description: Alerts if CDSS indicates impaired mobility and nurse input mentions 'falls' or 'difficulty walking'.
rules.generated_alert: Risk for falls due to impaired mobility. Implement fall precautions and assist with ambulation.

rules.name: Self-Care Deficit
rules.description: Alerts if CDSS indicates self-care deficit and nurse input mentions 'unable to bathe' or 'needs assistance feeding'.
rules.generated_alert: Self-care deficit identified. Provide assistance with activities of daily living and encourage independence where possible.
